text: Bicentennial Man is a 1999 American science fiction drama family movie. It stars Robin Williams. It is based on the novel The Positronic Man, co-written by Isaac Asimov and Robert Silverberg. It was directed by Chris Columbus and a co-production between Touchstone Pictures and Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1999 drama movies Category:1999 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies composed by James Horner Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Chris Columbus Category:Disney movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Bicentennial Man (movie)
